message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. It's a steal at this price, if I do say so myself!

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I'm not willing to go all the way up to $180. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $160 is a more reasonable price for this amazing product. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love it!

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product, which is a bit closer to my original target. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I'm willing to make one more concession, and I'll offer it to you for $155. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great value for the product. Let me know if you're interested!

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product, which is as close to my target as I'm willing to go. Can you consider this offer?
